name: Hophill Island
description:
Live the treasure hunt in a challenging platform game by helping Captain J. Starling through caves, docks and cliffs with incredible jumps, secret passages, deadly traps and lots of gold coins.

"HOPHILL ISLAND" is full of hidden secrets where all levels have different exit paths that represent several difficulties, so everyone can find their own challenge and replay each stage until discover all its mysteries.

FEATURES - All audiences
- 48 levels
- Mighty power ups.
- 2 degrees of difficulty
- Cartoon design (Special on Android) - NO ads
- Offline game
- NO permissions
- Auto-best performance

Take the "non-stop" playability concept of "Super Mario Run" but giving the player total freedom to explore each level with a simple and versatile control system wich get a lot of different actions: jump, double jump, climb and down platforms...
